headline: Balela Salad
name: Balela Salad
description: This balela is a quick Middle Eastern-style bean salad made with garbanzos, black beans, and lots of sweet grape tomatoes tossed in a tangy blender dressing.
recipeIngredient: 2 (15 ounce) cans garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed
salt and ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together garbanzo beans, black beans, mint, parsley, onion, and grape tomatoes in a large salad bowl until well combined.
Place jalapeño pepper, garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, and apple cider vinegar into a blender. Blend until dressing is thoroughly combined.
Pour dressing over salad and toss to mix. Sprinkle with salt and black pepper to serve.
